entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
